flute.name: FLUTE
flute.description: A small, ornate flute made of polished silver. It feels cool to the touch.
flute.flavor_text: As you hold it in your hands, you can almost hear a faint melody echoing from within.

wedding_band.name: WEDDING BAND
wedding_band.description: A thin, band of white gold, a sign of a covenant,  and a key to multiple futures.
wedding_band.flavor_text: It feels warm on your finger, humming with a gentle energy.

dog_treat.name: BACON
dog_treat.description: A delicious-looking dog treat. It smells like bacon.
dog_treat.flavor_text: The dog seems to be eyeing this with great interest.
